hero.title: Download Media from
hero.subtitle: Extract videos, audio, and images from 100+ popular websites with just a URL
hero.placeholder: Paste any video, audio, or image URL here...

authRequired.title: Sign in to Download
authRequired.description: Create a free account to download media files and access your download history.
authRequired.benefits: Free account • No credit card required • Download history included

authStatus.signedIn: Signed in as {{name}} • Ready to download
authStatus.signedOut: Sign in required for downloads • Analysis available without account

poweredBy.suffix: and ♥ - Trusted by thousands of users worldwide

features.title: Powerful Features for Every Need
features.subtitle: Built on the robust you-get engine with additional web interface enhancements

multipleFormats.title: Multiple Formats
multipleFormats.description: Download in various formats and quality levels - from 144p to 4K, MP4 to WebM, MP3 to FLAC.

lightningFast.title: Lightning Fast
lightningFast.description: Powered by you-get's optimized extraction engine for quick analysis and high-speed downloads.

privacyFirst.title: Privacy First
privacyFirst.description: No tracking, no data collection. All processing happens on our servers without storing your information.

advancedOptions.title: Advanced Options
advancedOptions.description: Proxy support, custom output paths, subtitle downloads, and batch processing capabilities.

streamDownload.title: Stream & Download
streamDownload.description: Preview content before downloading or stream directly to your preferred media player.

mobileFriendly.title: Mobile Friendly
mobileFriendly.description: Fully responsive design that works perfectly on all devices - desktop, tablet, and mobile.

supportedSites.title: 100+ Supported Platforms
supportedSites.subtitle: Download from the most popular video, audio, and image sharing platforms worldwide

universal.title: Universal Extractor
universal.description: Don't see your platform? Our universal extractor can handle most websites with downloadable content

dashboard.subtitle: Manage your downloads and view download history

empty.title: No downloads found
empty.description: Try adjusting your search or filter criteria
empty.noDownloads: Start downloading media to see your history here

authRequired.title: Access Restricted
authRequired.description: You need to sign in to access your download dashboard and view your download history.
authRequired.note: Don't have an account? Sign up is free and takes less than a minute.

systemStatus.ready: System ready - you-get {{version}} is installed and working

notMet.title: System Requirements Not Met
notMet.description: you-get is not installed or not accessible
notMet.install: To use this service, please install you-get:

errors.noMediaFound: No media found at this URL
errors.analysisError: Failed to analyze URL. Please check if the URL is valid and supported.
